-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Handling of multipart names in various casing styles
--   
@package multipart-names
@version 0.0.1


-- | Multipart names and <a>Prism</a>s for them.
module Text.MultipartNames

-- | An opaque type that represents a multipart name. The initial character
--   of each segment must be a cased letter. Currently, only ASCII letters
--   are allowed as first characters of segments.
data MultipartName

-- | Creates a multipart name from its segments.
mkMultipartName :: [String] -> MultipartName

-- | Creates a multipart name from words. Equivalent to <tt>mkMultipartName
--   . words</tt>.
mkMultipartNameFromWords :: String -> MultipartName

-- | Is this string a legal segment for a <a>MultipartName</a>?
isLegalSegment :: String -> Bool

-- | Returns the segments of the name
toSegments :: MultipartName -> [CI String]

-- | Display as lowerCamelCased.
showLowerCamel :: MultipartName -> String

-- | Display as UpperCamelCased.
showUpperCamel :: MultipartName -> String

-- | Display as lower-hyphenated.
showLowerHyphenated :: MultipartName -> String

-- | Display as UPPER-HYPHENATED.
showUpperHyphenated :: MultipartName -> String

-- | Display as lower_underscored.
showLowerUnderscored :: MultipartName -> String

-- | Display as UPPER_UNDERSCORED.
showUpperUnderscored :: MultipartName -> String

-- | A <a>Prism'</a> to convert lowerCamelCased <a>String</a>s to
--   <a>MultipartName</a>s.
_LowerCamel :: Prism' String MultipartName

-- | A <a>Prism'</a> to convert UpperCamelCased <a>String</a>s to
--   <a>MultipartName</a>s.
_UpperCamel :: Prism' String MultipartName

-- | A <a>Prism'</a> to convert case-insensitive-hyphenated <a>String</a>s
--   to <a>MultipartName</a>s.
_Hyphenated :: Prism' String MultipartName

-- | A <a>Prism'</a> to convert lower-hyphenated <a>String</a>s to
--   <a>MultipartName</a>s.
_LowerHyphenated :: Prism' String MultipartName

-- | A <a>Prism'</a> to convert UPPER-HYPHENATED <a>String</a>s to
--   <a>MultipartName</a>s.
_UpperHyphenated :: Prism' String MultipartName

-- | A <a>Prism'</a> to convert Case_Insensitive_Underscored <a>String</a>s
--   to <a>MultipartName</a>s.
_Underscored :: Prism' String MultipartName

-- | A <a>Prism'</a> to convert lower_underscored <a>String</a>s to
--   <a>MultipartName</a>s.
_LowerUnderscored :: Prism' String MultipartName

-- | A <a>Prism'</a> to convert UPPER_UNDERSCORED <a>String</a>s to
--   <a>MultipartName</a>s.
_UpperUnderscored :: Prism' String MultipartName
